snippet.title: Warframe | Echoes of Duviri: Damage Numbers Dev Workshop Video
snippet.description:
You work hard to maximize the destructive power of your Warframes and Weapons, so it’s only fair that you get to see and measure the results! To that end, we’re making some adjustments to the Damage numbers that appear on-screen during combat. Let Lead Designer Pablo Alonso explain what we’re doing to make these numbers more visible (not to mention more satisfying).

Enjoy these and other QOL changes when Echoes of Duviri launches on all platforms July 27.

[FORUM LINK COPY]

0:00 Current Damage Numbers
2:19 Changes Coming to Damage Numbers
3:44 New Custom Settings
